2. 필수과제

  • Conv layer 구성 
    nn.Conv2d(
in_channels = prev_cdim,
out_channels = cdim,
kernel_size = self.ksize,
stride=(1,1),
padding=self.ksize//2)
)
  • Conv 훈련 
    y_pred = C.forward(batch_in.view(-1,1,28,28).to(device))
loss_out = loss(y_pred,batch_out.to(device))
# Update
optm.zero_grad()
loss_out.backward()
optm.step()
